main.name: Sebastian Echtler
main.description: Get to know me and projects I am working on at the moment.
main.description2: Let me know, if you have any questions!
main.bio: Hey! I am a tech focused guy with an entrepreneurial spirit and a passion for coding. I love to see progress being made, if it's reaching a milestone on a project or achieving personal life goals. I love discussing all things technological. It is my personal belief that everybody can make a change towards a better future for everyone. I am always thrilled to learn more, which is why I am currently trying to learn chess! In my free time i like going to the gym or spending time outdoors on a camping trip or fishing.
main.contactmessage: I am sorry, the Contact Form is currently not working. Please reach out to me via E-Mail or LinkedIn. I am working on fixing it.

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of my core skills:

work.title: Senior Consultant
work.description: I am currently working as a Senior Consultant at CGI. I am responsible for the technical implementation of different Dynamcis 365 Environments for our clients. I am also responsible for several internal projects like the developement of different MS Teams-Apps or a .NET/Angular Web Service.

work.title: Junior Consultant for Microsoft technologies
work.description: I started my professional Career at Acando in Munich. I mainly worked with Microsoft technologies for various different Clients. I also started working on Dynamics 365 (onPremise and in the cloud).

work.title: Thesis / Working Student
work.description: I wrote my Bachelors Thesis at BMW in Munich. I created a SharePoint based .Net-Application to support the Auditors during the audit process.

work.title: Working Student Softwaredevelopement
work.description: As a working Student i mostly worked on a SharePoint Project to automate processes. I developed a .Net based WPF Application, that did a lot of Word and PDF Magic for the users, saving them a lot of time.

work.title: Internship at Prokuktaudit
work.description: During my internship I mostly worked on Excel and SharePoint Automation. I also helped revising processes and developed techical solutions for the various problems.

projects.title: Echtler-Mobile
projects.category: Ihr Partner für Wohnmobile im Allgäu

projects.title: Perso Status Checker
projects.category: I provide a service to automatically check the status of your ID at Bürgerbüro in Munich.

projects.title: Find more Projects at GitHub!
projects.category: Feel free to checkout my public Repositories at Github. If you have any questions, feel free to ask me!

testimonials.text: Never spend 6 Minutes doing something by hand when you can spend 6 hours failing to automate it!
Your willingness to take risks scares me, but your success proves you right.
